titles.title: Employee Rights Protection Act of 1996
To amend title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit employment discrimination based on participation in labor organization activities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/9/1996--Introduced. Employee Rights Protection Act of 1996 - Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to add references to discrimination on the basis of labor organization activities to provisions relating to various unlawful employment practices, enforcement, and Federal employment.
